thread.title: Bhojpuri IPL to be held in Mumbai
thread.title_full: Bhojpuri IPL to be held in Mumbai - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Bhojpuri IPL to be held in Mumbai
text:
A cricket tournament meant exclusively for the people working in Bhojpuri film industry is being organised in Mumbai. It will be called the Bhojpuri Industry Premiere League (BIPL). The tournament will witness participation of four teams. The captains of the teams will be Manoj Tiwari, Ravi Kishan, Nirahua and Pravesh Lal.
The BIPL matches will be played on October 24 and 25. Actors, producers, directors and technicians associated with Bhojpuri cinema will be seen showing off their cricketing talent. The tournament is being organised by Pravesh Lal Yadav, Rahul Khan and Asgar Khan.
Source: Bhojpurimedia.com
